title: Enchanting Padakam Necklace: A Symphony of Emeralds and Diamonds
materials: Sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and premium finish.
features: This exquisite necklace features a sleek, modern U-shaped design adorned with vibrant Emeralds and glittering CZ stones. The centerpiece is a grand Padakam pendant, intricately crafted with floral motifs and delicate hanging gold droplets. The overall design balances traditional South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary feel.
colors: and Dazzling White CZ stones create a rich and captivating color palette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (vivaham)
and grand celebrations. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: This Padakam Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of genuine Emeralds and high-quality CZ stones offers exceptional sparkle and value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the traditional design is ideal for those seeking a blend of heritage and contemporary style. A statement piece that embodies cultural richness and sophisticated beauty.
